title: Harsher penalties for leavers
body:
I've recently had a spat of people just leaving games for no reason. Either they dont like how its going, or any number of reasons.

The system in place to 'gate' how often they can play, is pretty much not a problem to them. They're already willing to abandon a game, and go do something else while the game plays on without them, so what is another 20minutes while they just wait for the timer to finish then get into a new game.

I've even talked to a few who have this gating. They dont care. They think its great there isnt an actual punishment for them other than time leaving the game open.

There needs to be implemented harsher penalties for people who afk games. Limit their IP on top of gating their games, something that actually affects them in games. Ban them from anything other than bots games for weeks.

But I'm just getting really frustrated that I get stuck in a 4v5, they other team thinks its great, and the person on my team who left faces 0 real punishment

replies.body: people can dc, you going to punish them because of a storm? you have no soul. All riot needs to do is give out 3 day bans to anyone who quits more than 5 games in a week, because then there is no other excuse, its doubtful you would play 5 games and dc over and over if you know its going to happen, so 5 misses a week (reset on Tuesday) no more, they get a warning at 5 then are banned on 6, problem solved.

> people can dc, you going to punish them because of a storm?

OP is talking about changing punishments, not requirements. Leavebuster would still give the usual allowance for unintended DCs but be more severe for chronic leavers.
